short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns you about Rick Roll links - never get Rick Rolled again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never get Rick Rolled again.

This extension pops a mini Rick Astley next to all links which could Rick Roll you, and warns when you click on one.
